00001 /* bpred-blg.cpp: BLG predictor based on USPTO patent US
00002    6,374,349 B2, Scott McFarling, "Branch Predictor with
00003    Serially Connected Predictor Stages for Improving Branch
00004    Prediction Accuracy"                                    */
00005 /*
00006  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00007  */
00008 
00009 #include <math.h>
00010 #define COMPONENT_NAME "blg"
00011 
00012 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00013 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00014 {
00015   int B_size;
00016   int L_size;
00017   int L_hist_len;
00018   int L_hist_size;
00019   int L_tag_size;
00020   int G_size;
00021   int G_tag_size;
00022 
00023   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&B_size,&L_size,&L_hist_len,&L_hist_size,&L_tag_size,&G_size,&G_tag_size) != 8)
00024     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"blg:name:B_size:L_size:L_hist_len:L_hist_size:L_tag_size:G_size:G_tag_size\")",opt_string);
00025   return new bpred_blg_t(name,B_size,L_size,L_hist_len,L_hist_size,L_tag_size,G_size,G_tag_size);
00026 }
00027 #else

00029 class bpred_blg_t:public bpred_dir_t
00030 {
00031   class bpred_blg_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00032   {
00033     public:
00034     md_addr_t PC;
00035     int lookup_stew;
00036     int lookup_L_hist;
00037 
00038     int B_index;
00039     int L_index;
00040     int L_hist_index;
00041     int G_index;
00042 
00043     int B_pred;
00044     int L_pred;
00045     int G_pred;
00046 
00047     int G_hit;
00048     int L_hit;
00049 
00050     int G_tag;
00051   };
00052 
00053   protected:
00054 
00055   int B_size;
00056   int B_mask;
00057   int L_size;
00058   int L_mask;
00059   int L_hist_len;
00060   int L_hist_size;
00061   int L_hist_mask;
00062   int L_tag_size;
00063   int G_size;
00064   int G_mask;
00065   int G_tag_size;
00066

00068   int L_tag_mask;

00070   int G_tag_shamt;
00071   int G_tag_mask;

00073   my2bc_t * B;
00074   int * L_hist;
00075   my2bc_t * L;
00076   int * L_tag;
00077   my2bc_t * G;
00078   int * G_tag;

00084   /* CREATE */
00085   bpred_blg_t(char * const arg_name,
00086               const int arg_B_size,
00087               const int arg_L_size,
00088               const int arg_L_hist_len,
00089               const int arg_L_hist_size,
00090               const int arg_L_tag_size,
00091               const int arg_G_size,
00092               const int arg_G_tag_size
00093              )
00094   {
00095     init();
00096 
00097     /* verify arguments are valid */
00098     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_B_size);
00099     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_L_size);
00100     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_L_hist_size);
00101     CHECK_POS(arg_L_hist_len);
00102     CHECK_POS(arg_L_tag_size);
00103     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_G_size);
00104     CHECK_POS(arg_G_tag_size);
00105 
00106     name = strdup(arg_name);
00107     if(!name)
00108       fatal("couldn't malloc blg name (strdup)");
00109     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00110     if(!type)
00111       fatal("couldn't malloc blg type (strdup)");
00112 
00113     B_size = arg_B_size;
00114     B_mask = arg_B_size-1;
00115     L_size = arg_L_size;
00116     L_mask = arg_L_size-1;
00117     L_hist_len = arg_L_hist_len;
00118     L_hist_size = arg_L_hist_size;
00119     L_hist_mask = arg_L_hist_size-1;
00120     L_tag_size = arg_L_tag_size;
00121     G_size = arg_G_size;
00122     G_mask = arg_G_size-1;
00123     G_tag_size = arg_G_tag_size;
00124 
00125     L_tag_shamt = log_base2(arg_L_size);
00126     L_tag_mask = (1<<arg_L_tag_size)-1;
00127     G_tag_shamt = log_base2(arg_G_size);
00128     G_tag_mask = (1<<arg_G_tag_size)-1;
00129 
00130     B = (my2bc_t*) calloc(B_size,sizeof(*B));
00131     if(!B)
00132       fatal("failed to calloc blg B-array");
00133     for(int i=0;i<B_size;i++)
00134       B[i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00135 
00136     L_hist = (int*) calloc(L_hist_size,sizeof(*L_hist));
00137     L_tag = (int*) calloc(L_hist_size,sizeof(*L_tag));
00138     L = (my2bc_t*) calloc(L_size,sizeof(*L));
00139     if(!L_hist || !L || !L_tag)
00140       fatal("failed to calloc blg L-arrays");
00141     for(int i=0;i<L_size;i++)
00142     {
00143       if((i>>(L_hist_len-1)) & 1) /* shift mode */
00144       {
00145         if(i&1)
00146           L[i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00147         else
00148           L[i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00149       }
00150       else /* count mode */
00151       {
00152         if((i>>(L_hist_len-2)) & 1)
00153           L[i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00154         else
00155           L[i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00156       }
00157     }
00158 
00159     G = (my2bc_t*) calloc(G_size,sizeof(*G));
00160     G_tag = (int*) calloc(G_size,sizeof(*G_tag));
00161     if(!G || !G_tag)
00162       fatal("failed to calloc blg G-arrays");
00163     for(int i=0;i<G_size;i++)
00164       G[i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00165 
00166     bits = B_size*2 + L_size*2 + L_hist_size*(L_hist_len+L_tag_size)
00167               + G_size*(2+G_tag_size);
00168   }
00169 
00170   /* DESTROY */
00171   ~bpred_blg_t()
00172   {
00173     free(B); B = NULL;
00174     free(L); L = NULL;
00175     free(L_hist); L_hist = NULL;
00176     free(L_tag); L_tag = NULL;
00177     free(G); G = NULL;
00178     free(G_tag); G_tag = NULL;
00179   }
00180 
00181   /* LOOKUP */
00182   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00183   {
00184     class bpred_blg_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_blg_sc_t*) scvp;
00185 
00186     sc->PC = PC;
00187     sc->B_index = PC&B_mask;
00188     sc->B_pred = MY2BC_DIR(B[sc->B_index]);
00189 
00190     sc->L_hist_index = (PC<<1) & L_hist_mask;
00191     sc->L_index = ((((PC << L_hist_len) | L_hist[sc->L_hist_index]) << 1) | sc->B_pred) & L_mask;
00192     sc->lookup_L_hist = L_hist[sc->L_hist_index];
00193     sc->L_hit = ((PC>>L_tag_shamt)&L_tag_mask) == (unsigned)L_tag[sc->L_hist_index];
00194     sc->L_pred = sc->L_hit?MY2BC_DIR(L[sc->L_index]):sc->B_pred;
00195 
00196     int temp = ((PC ^ stew)<<1) | sc->L_pred;
00197     sc->G_tag = temp & G_tag_mask;
00198     sc->G_index = ((temp >> G_tag_size) ^ sc->G_tag) & G_mask;
00199     sc->G_pred = MY2BC_DIR(G[sc->G_index]);
00200     sc->G_hit = sc->G_tag == G_tag[sc->G_index];
00201 
00202     sc->lookup_stew = stew;
00203 
00204     sc->updated = false;
00205     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00206 
00207 
00208     if     (sc->G_hit) return sc->G_pred;
00209     else if(sc->L_hit) return sc->L_pred;
00210     else               return sc->B_pred;
00211   }
00212 
00213   /* UPDATE  partial update rules somewhat modeled after Michaud's CBP PPM-like predictor */
00214   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00215   {
00216     class bpred_blg_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_blg_sc_t*) scvp;
00217 
00218     if(!sc->updated)
00219     {
00220       int L_hit = sc->L_hit;
00221       int G_hit = sc->G_hit;
00222 
00223       /* update counter that provided the prediction */
00224       if(G_hit)
00225       {
00226         MY2BC_UPDATE(G[sc->G_index],outcome);
00227       }
00228       else if(L_hit)
00229       {
00230         MY2BC_UPDATE(L[sc->L_index],outcome);
00231       }
00232       else
00233       {
00234         MY2BC_UPDATE(B[sc->B_index],outcome);
00235       }
00236 
00237       if(our_pred != outcome) /* we were wrong, try stealing a counter */
00238       {
00239 
00240         if(!L_hit && !G_hit)
00241         {
00242           /* allocate in L */
00243           L_tag[sc->L_hist_index] = ((PC>>L_tag_shamt)&L_tag_mask);
00244 
00245           /* history initialization */
00246           if((B[sc->B_index] == MY2BC_STRONG_NT) && outcome)
00247             L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = 0xfffffff1;
00248           else if((B[sc->B_index] == MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT) && outcome)
00249             L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = 0xffffffe3;
00250           else if((B[sc->B_index] == MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN) && !outcome)
00251             L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = 0x0000001c;
00252           else if((B[sc->B_index] == MY2BC_STRONG_TAKEN) && !outcome)
00253             L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = 0x0000000e;
00254 
00255           L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] &= (1<<(L_hist_len-1))-1;
00256           L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] |= 1<<(L_hist_len-1); /* set to shift mode */
00257 
00258           //int new_L_index = ((PC << L_hist_len) | L_hist[sc->L_hist_index]) & L_mask;
00259           int new_L_index = ((((PC << L_hist_len) | L_hist[sc->L_hist_index]) << 1) | sc->B_pred) & L_mask;
00260 
00261           L[new_L_index] = outcome?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00262 
00263           /* allocate in G */
00264           G_tag[sc->G_index] = sc->G_tag;
00265           G[sc->G_index] = outcome?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00266         }
00267 
00268         if(L_hit && !G_hit)
00269         {
00270           /* allocate in G */
00271           G_tag[sc->G_index] = sc->G_tag;
00272           G[sc->G_index] = outcome?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00273         }
00274       }
00275 
00276       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00277       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00278       sc->updated = true;
00279     }
00280   }
00281 
00282 
00283   /* SPEC UPDATE */
00284   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00285   {
00286     class bpred_blg_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_blg_sc_t*) scvp;
00287 
00288     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00289 
00290     stew = ((stew ^ PC)<<1)|our_pred;
00291 
00292     /* shift or count update */
00293     if(((PC>>L_tag_shamt)&L_tag_mask) == (unsigned)(L_tag[sc->L_hist_index])) /* L_hist hit */
00294     {
00295       int hist = L_hist[sc->L_hist_index];
00296 
00297       if((hist>>(L_hist_len-1)) & 1) /* shift mode */
00298       {
00299         hist <<= 1;
00300         hist |= our_pred;
00301 
00302         int tmp = hist & ((1<<(L_hist_len-1))-1);
00303         if((tmp == 0) || ((~tmp)==0)) /* same bit repeated for full hist, switch to count mode */
00304         {
00305           if(our_pred)
00306             hist = 1<<(L_hist_len-2);
00307           else
00308             hist = 0;
00309         }
00310         else
00311         {
00312           hist |= 1<<(L_hist_len-1);
00313           hist &= (1<<(L_hist_len))-1;
00314         }
00315       }
00316       else /* count mode */
00317       {
00318         int dir = (hist>>(L_hist_len-2)) & 1;
00319         if(dir == our_pred)
00320         {
00321           int count = hist & ((1<<(L_hist_len-2))-1);
00322           count++;
00323           if(count >> (L_hist_len-2)) /* saturated */
00324             count--;
00325 
00326           hist = (dir<<(L_hist_len-2)) | count;
00327         }
00328         else /* direction change */
00329         {
00330           hist = 1;   /* 000...0001 */
00331           if(!our_pred)
00332             hist = ~hist; /* 111...1110 */
00333           hist |= 1<<(L_hist_len-1); /* set to shift mode */
00334         }
00335       }
00336 
00337       L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = hist;
00338     }
00339   }
00340 
00341   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00342   {
00343     class bpred_blg_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_blg_sc_t*) scvp;
00344 
00345     stew = ((sc->lookup_stew ^ sc->PC)<<1)|outcome;
00346 
00347     /* if local hist still matches */
00348     if(((sc->PC>>L_tag_shamt)&L_tag_mask) == (unsigned)(L_tag[sc->L_hist_index]))
00349     {
00350       int hist = sc->lookup_L_hist;
00351 
00352       if((hist>>(L_hist_len-1)) & 1) /* shift mode */
00353       {
00354         hist <<= 1;
00355         hist |= outcome;
00356 
00357         int tmp = hist & ((1<<(L_hist_len-1))-1);
00358         if((tmp == 0) || ((~tmp)==0)) /* same bit repeated for full hist, switch to count mode */
00359         {
00360           if(outcome)
00361             hist = 1<<(L_hist_len-2);
00362           else
00363             hist = 0;
00364         }
00365         else
00366         {
00367           hist |= 1<<(L_hist_len-1);
00368           hist &= (1<<(L_hist_len))-1;
00369         }
00370       }
00371       else /* count mode */
00372       {
00373         int dir = (hist>>(L_hist_len-2)) & 1;
00374         if(dir == outcome)
00375         {
00376           int count = hist & ((1<<(L_hist_len-2))-1);
00377           count++;
00378           if(count >> (L_hist_len-2)) /* saturated */
00379             count--;
00380 
00381           hist = (dir<<(L_hist_len-2)) | count;
00382         }
00383         else /* direction change */
00384         {
00385           hist = 1;   /* 000...0001 */
00386           if(!outcome)
00387             hist = ~hist; /* 111...1110 */
00388           hist |= 1<<(L_hist_len-1); /* set to shift mode */
00389         }
00390       }
00391 
00392       L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = hist;
00393     }
00394   }
00395 
00396   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00397   {
00398     class bpred_blg_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_blg_sc_t*) scvp;
00399 
00400     stew = sc->lookup_stew ^ sc->PC;
00401 
00402     /* if local hist still matches */
00403     if(((sc->PC>>L_tag_shamt)&L_tag_mask) == (unsigned)(L_tag[sc->L_hist_index]))
00404       L_hist[sc->L_hist_index] = sc->lookup_L_hist;
00405   }
00406 
00407   /* GET_CACHE */
00408   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00409   {
00410     class bpred_blg_sc_t * sc = new bpred_blg_sc_t();
00411     if(!sc)
00412       fatal("couldn't malloc blg State Cache");
00413     return sc;
00414   }
00415
